definition: to obtain (sth) in exchange/to exchange (sth) for (sth else)
to exchange/to change (clothes etc)/to substitute/to switch/to convert (currency)

sentences.english: But you can exchange it for an international one at the sole agent's office.
sentences.chinese: 但你可以换取一张国际保用证，要到总代理那里去换。

sentences.english: The best is only brought at the cost of great pain.
sentences.chinese: 最美好的事物只能用深创巨痛来换取。

sentences.english: JDX Tea membership card has been changed to quality scores in exchange for Voucher to the program.
sentences.chinese: 九鼎香优质会员卡已更改为以分数换取礼券程式。
她牺牲荣誉以换取财富。

sentences.english: I could pay for things with food or something.
sentences.chinese: 我可用食物或其它东西来换取劳务费呀。

sentences.english: Nor would she want me to barter her self-image for a few years in prison.
sentences.chinese: 她也不想要我去为她坐几年的牢而换取她的自我形象。

sentences.english: In order to assist jiang is capable ZhangXiaoYan betray my personality, in exchange for money.
sentences.chinese: 为了协助江一帆，张晓燕出卖本人人格换取金钱。

sentences.english: Players can now turn in one of each battleground mark for an honor reward.
sentences.chinese: 现在玩家可以用4大战场的徽记各一个来换取荣誉。

sentences.english: The proposed scheme has the lower handover call probability at the cost of little utility.
sentences.chinese: 该策略以少量的效用代价换取较低的切换掉话率。

sentences.english: Find someone who knows how tall the building is, and trade him the barometer for the information.
sentences.chinese: 找一个知道楼高的人，用气压计换取信息。

sentences.english: It would see lenders write down the mortgage amount in exchange for a government guarantee.
sentences.chinese: 此举会导致出借方提供抵押贷款额以换取政府保障。

sentences.english: North Korea quit the aid-for-disarmament discussions in April.
sentences.chinese: 四月，朝鲜退出了以援助换取裁军的讨论。

sentences.english: Where are youswapping cash for conveniences you don’t really need?
sentences.chinese: 你是否真的需要用金钱还换取那所谓的便利？

sentences.english: Lazio reportedly offered want-away defender Guglielmo Stendardo in exchange for Lucchini.
sentences.chinese: 据报道拉齐奥想用斯滕达尔多换取卢基尼。

sentences.english: The end result is extremely quick code at the expense of build time.
sentences.chinese: 最终结果是牺牲编译时间来换取极快的代码。

sentences.english: Free men paidfor their freedom by leaving that false and illusory security.
sentences.chinese: 自由人以离开那种虚幻的安全保障来换取自由。

definition: to make a profit/to earn a packet
to seek/to strive for/to obtain/see also 牟取[mou2 qu3]
not stint/not spare/not hesitate (to do sth)/not scruple (to do sth)
to sacrifice one's life/to sacrifice (sth valued)/beast slaughtered as a sacrifice
to offer/to give (as tribute)/to devote (one's life)/to sacrifice (oneself)
to sell/to offer for sale/to put on the market
